untapped.author: Peter Skopa @swetoast
untapped.title: Untapped
untapped.short_description: Checks your untappd info and keeps you updated from home-assistant

required.username: The username of the Untaped user, you want updates for.

untapped.instructions: You will need to apply for an [API from Untapped](https://untappd.com/api) to use this.
